mapper.sql: sqlname, databasename1, databasename2, tablename1, tablename2, tablefield1, tablefield2, relationcondition, wherecondition, createtime
mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into data_processing_sql (sqlname, databasename1, databasename2, tablename1, tablename2, tablefield1, tablefield2, relationcondition, wherecondition) values (#{sqlname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{databasename1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{databasename2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablename1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablename2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablefield1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablefield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationcondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wherecondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

tablefield1,

relationcondition,

databasename1 = #{databasename1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
